desc: The Sensitive Type is a new approach to beauty. We create fun, considerate and effective products that are good for skin, sustainably focused, vegan & cruelty free, made for all. We give back to the community with a donation for every sale.

layout.text: Welcome to The Sensitive Type. We've got what you've been looking for!
We make sustainable, vegan and cruelty-free natural skincare products.
Our products are good for your skin, our community and our planet.
